Class OfficerRegistrationService

java.lang.Object
com.SC2002.bto.service.impl.OfficerRegistrationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IOfficerRegistrationService
public class OfficerRegistrationService extends Object implements IOfficerRegistrationService
Implementation of the officer registration service. Follows the Dependency Inversion Principle by depending on repository interfaces.
